sprint_goal: Establish Core Infrastructure and Authentication Foundation
epic_coverage: Core Infrastructure & DevOps, Authentication & User Management, Service Request Lifecycle, Frontend Applications (Web & Mobile)
key_deliverables: VNet & DB Infra; Auth Module with B2C; WebSocket Gateway; Mobile Local DB
demo_objectives: Show DB Connectivity; Authenticate a user via B2C; Connect to WS Gateway
success_criteria: All infrastructure provisioned; Auth unit tests passing
risk_factors: Terraform state management; New Auth strategy complexity
mitigation_strategies: Pair programming on Terraform; Early POC for Passport strategy

sprint_goal: Core Service Logic and Mobile Foundation
epic_coverage: Core Infrastructure & DevOps, Authentication & User Management, Service Request Lifecycle, Frontend Applications (Web & Mobile)
key_deliverables: AKS Cluster; User Sync Logic; Service Center Geo-Entities; Mobile Background Location; Mobile Sync Engine
demo_objectives: AKS Cluster Healthy; User creation syncs to DB; Mobile app tracks location in background
success_criteria: Sync logic handles conflicts; Background location persists on OS
risk_factors: RISK-TECH-001 (OS killing background loc); RISK-DATA-003 (Sync conflicts)
mitigation_strategies: Test on physical devices immediately; Implement 'Server Wins' policy

epic_coverage: Service Request Lifecycle, Frontend Applications (Web & Mobile)
key_deliverables: Geospatial Routing Query; Location Ingestion & Broadcast; Mobile Location Emitter
demo_objectives: End-to-end real-time tracking of technician on user map
success_criteria: Latency < 2s; Accurate routing based on polygon
mitigation_strategies: Validate PostGIS index performance; Redis adapter verified
